title: Update dropdown text to show Bharatnatyam class frequency (2/week, 8/month)

requirements.text: Update the dropdown option text for the Bharatnatyam style so it clearly indicates the frequency "2 classes per week (8 per month)" wherever dance styles are shown using the shared style options list (e.g., the class catalog style filter and the class creation form style selector).

quotes: Bharatnatyam classes per month 2 classes per week in select classes drop down menu

acceptanceCriteria: In the style dropdown used on the catalog page, the Bharatnatyam option includes the text "2 classes per week (8 per month)" (in the label and/or description).
In the style dropdown used in the Create New Class dialog, the Bharatnatyam option includes the text "2 classes per week (8 per month)" (in the label and/or description).
All user-facing text is in English and renders without layout overflow/truncation issues beyond existing line-clamp behavior.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable.
Keep backend architecture as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not implement scheduling logic that enforces 2 sessions per week or 8 sessions per month in the backend.
Do not change pricing, booking flow, or payment behavior.
